snippet.title: Next Move | Release Trailer | VR
snippet.description:
Play the game on oculus: https://www.meta.com/experiences/6785834628189984?ranking_trace=0_6785834628189984_QUESTSEARCH_0vLp1xmEiHqSkRjGu_eyJwbGF0Zm9ybSI6ImFuZHJvaWQtNmRvZiIsInF1ZXJ5X3N0cmluZyI6Im5leHRtb3ZlIiwibG9jYWxlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJudW1fZmV0Y2giOjEwMSwic2VhcmNoX3JvdXRlIjoid2ViIiwidGFnX2lkcyI6W119_eyJzZWN0aW9uX2tleSI6IlNFQVJDSCJ9

Take a journey through surreal landscapes and fantastical architecture with this VR platformer. Your physical movements are directly translating to in-game actions. You will experience classic platforming like never before while bending the time itself to your will.

Next Move is a VR platformer where all your in-game movements correspond to your physical movements. No joystick walking! Get your body moving and set off on a journey to dreamlike worlds full of fantasy architecture.

--------------------------------------------------

ABOUT NEXT MOVE
- Real-world movement
- Mind-bending worlds
- Enemies and time manipulation

--------------------------------------------------

RELEASE - 30/11/2023
Hold tight.

--------------------------------------------------

DEMO
[Oculus App Lab](https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/6647889621939966/?utm_source=sidequest&store=quest&item_id=6647889621939966&r=1)

--------------------------------------------------

STEAM WISHLIST
[Click and support](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2434810/Next_Move/)

--------------------------------------------------

CONNECT
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/NextMoveVR)
- [Website](https://typicogames.com/)

--------------------------------------------------

SIDEQUEST
[Find us](https://sidequestvr.com/app/17333/next-move-demo-on-oculus-quest-2)
